text: “Digau aamua huogodoo ala i baahi ngeia la i di gowaa deelaa, mo digau hogi o Sidon. I mua gei nadau mogobuna guu hai nia henua gi mmaadagu, gei dolomeenei digaula gu nadau aamua ai, gu haga langaadia, guu hula gi lala madalia digau ala ne mmade i tauwa, guu danu gi lala gei digi sirkumsais, digaula gu haga langaadia gadoo be digau ala guu hula gi lala gi tenua o digau mmade.
